title: Making of a legend: Gone with the wind
creator_credit: David Hinton, L. Jeffrey Selznick, Selznick Properties and Turner Entertainment
brief_description: A feature length documentary which takes a behind-the-scenes look at the making of the 1939 feature film “Gone With the Wind”. Utilises some rare film footage including several screen tests for the part of Scarlett O’Hara, and home movies featuring Vivien Leigh. A fascinating inside view of one of the great accomplishments in motion picture history. Narrated by Christopher Plummer.
